org.lcsim.detector.tracker.silicon

Class HpsThinSiSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.detector.DetectorElement
      • org.lcsim.detector.tracker.silicon.SiSensor
        • org.lcsim.detector.tracker.silicon.HpsSiSensor
          • org.lcsim.detector.tracker.silicon.HpsThinSiSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Identifiable, IDetectorElement

    public class HpsThinSiSensor
extends HpsSiSensor
    Description of the layer 0 sensors used by the SVT. This class extends HpsSiSensor but overrides several properties such as strip pitch and sense transfer efficiency. It should be noted that this sensor has no intermediate strips and that is why the sense transfer efficiency is 0.

    • Field Summary

      • getSenseTransferEfficiency

        public double getSenseTransferEfficiency()
        Get the charge transfer efficiency of the sense strips. The thin sensors don't have an intermediate strip so the charge transfer efficiency is zero.
        Overrides:
        getSenseTransferEfficiency in class HpsSiSensor
